column1: ==RUDE== Dude, you are rude upload that carl picture back, or else.
== OK! ==  IM GOING TO VANDALIZE WILD ONES WIKI THEN!!!

The consensus is overwhelmingly against you and your trollin g lover Zapatancas,
==You're cool==  You seem like a really cool guy... *bursts out laughing at sarcasm*.
